org.treetank.node

Class DocumentRootNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.node.DocumentRootNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INode, IStructNode

    public final class DocumentRootNode
extends Object
implements INode, IStructNode

    DocumentNode

    Node representing the root of a document. This node is guaranteed to exist in revision 0 and can not be removed.
